name: Ebay de Product Details Page Scraper
title: Ebay de Product Details Page Scraper
tool_name: Ebay de Product Details Page Scraper

api_list.name: Detail Page
api_list.description:
Get all Data from https://www.ebay.de/itm/ITEM_ID

**Payload:** ITEM_ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-de-product-details-page-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/ebay/details/265488616472"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-de-product-details-page-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-de-product-details-page-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/ebay/details/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-de-product-details-page-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
